# Erik Olsson - Personal Website

> A high-performance personal portfolio and website built with Astro.

## Identity & Purpose
This website was brought to life by **Erik Olsson** as a professional digital presence. It is a static site deployed via GitHub Pages, focusing on speed and clean code.

## Pages
- [Home](https://mangila.github.io/): Overview of Erik's work and current projects.
- [About](https://mangila.github.io/about): Background on Erik Olsson's experience and skills.
- [Contact](https://mangila.github.io/contact): Direct channels to get in touch.

## Technical Stack
- **Framework**: Astro (Static Site Generation)
- **Deployment**: GitHub Pages
- **Performance**: Optimized for near-instant load times and high Lighthouse scores.

## Social & Links
- [GitHub](https://github.com/mangila): View the source code and other projects.
